title: What are some of the most badass last words in history? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, there are many badass last words are a just a few of them. Terminator—”I’ll be back”Scarface—”You think you can kill me with your fu— bullets? I’ll take your fu— bullets. Go ahead!!”Star Trek the wrath-=Spock said, “Live long and prosper”Kill Bill 2—” That really was a Hanso sword”Brave heart—William Wallace said, “ FREEDOM!!”Sin City—Mickey Rourke said, “Is that all you can do, you pansies??”Princess Bride==Wallace Shawn said, “Never go in against a Sicilian when death is on the line, Ha, ha, ha”Titanic—Leonard Caprio said, “ Never let go”Saving Private Ryan—Tom Hanks says, “Earn this Earn this James”Full Metal Jacket—SGT. Hartman says, “ What is your major malfunction numbnuts. Didn’t mommy and daddy show you enough attention as a child??”

On your deathbed… “Son/daughter/friend, I hid a million dollars under the…” *dies*“I should have told you sooner… you’re not my child…”“I told you years ago not to eat those cookies… now look what you’ve done to me.”“I’ve been possessing you at night… that’s how you get all those bruises you can’t remember getting.”“You think this is the end for me? I’m simply returning to my master. He has been waiting…..”All I can think of at the moment. (Shrug)
